content1.text: PICO PARK is also known as Pico Park. This is a multiplayer cooperative action puzzle game that has been popular all over the Internet recently and is loved by players. The game relies on its simple and easy-to-use operation method, novel and unique level design, or Q The cute and cute character image has captured the hearts of a large number of players. So what magic power does it have? Let's follow the editor. The rules in the Pico PARK game are very simple. Players only need to obtain all the keys to achieve their goals, and then they can easily win. Although it sounds very simple, many well-designed trap levels in the game, as well as factors such as non-tacit multiplayer cooperation methods, will cause the game to fail.

Therefore, it is urgent for all players to work together and cooperate with each other to easily break through the level successfully. Not only that, in order to enhance the fun of players, in addition to massive level challenges, the game also has an endless mode, where you can cooperate with three or five friends to win together, score high scores together, and win a lot of rewards.

In short, although this PICO PARK theme is not very novel and unique, its interesting gameplay still adds a lot of points to it. The following editor also organizes a guide on PICO PARK for your free reference. Interested friends are welcome to download the experience.

content2.text:
1. Flexible levels.
When the player gets the key, opens the door, and all players arrive, the level can be cracked. However, each level requires concerted efforts and mutual cooperation to complete.
2. The battle mode
cooperation mode is the main content of this game, but when we complete the cooperation mode with our friends, we might as well try the battle mode to compete with friends.

3. Endless Mode
Even if you have completed all 48 levels, you can still play in Endless Mode and cooperate with friends to get high scores. Through continuous cooperation, the score becomes higher and higher.
4. Online mode
You can play with people from all over the world through the Internet.

content3.text: At the beginning of the game, there is a switch in the front. The function of the switch is to alternately connect the left and right roads. In fact, you can pass the level in fewer steps without touching the switch. First, let the little girl enter the yellow light, and switch to let the ghost reach the other yellow light. At the place, purple light and green fog appeared.

Let the little girl enter the purple light, and let the ghost teleport through the green mist to another purple light. The road in the red circle connects, and the little girl passes through the green mist and enters the next door.
Enter the light first, then switch the ghost. For the follow-up steps, please refer to the arrow mark in the picture and will not be described again. If you have any questions, please ask.

content4.text:
PICO PARK is an online action decryption game, so how much is the price of this game?
I guess you are not sure about it. The following is an introduction to the price of PICO PARKsteam.
'PICO PARK' is a local/networked multiplayer cooperative action decryption game with 2 to 8 players. The price of this game on steam is 22 yuan.
Its rules are very simple: 'get all the keys to achieve the goal', but in all 48 levels there are special designs for multiplayer games. In most levels, different designs will come as you move forward. You need to communicate well with your teammates and think about new ways of cooperation.

content5.text:
1. There are many level tasks, and each kitty has its own tasks that need to be completed.
2. When necessary, you need to control the cat to stack up to complete some difficult movements.
3. A park with only cats, and you, as the host, can take them to play.

Configuration requirements
1, the minimum configuration:
Operating System: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 /8 / 8.1
Processor: Dual Core 1.6GHz or equivalent
Memory: 1 GB RAM
DirectX version: 9.0c
storage space: 100 MB free space
2, Recommended configuration:
Operating system: Microsoft® Windows® 8.1
Processor: Dual Core 1.6GHz or equivalent
Memory: 1 GB RAM
DirectX version: 9.0c
Storage space: 100 MB free space required
